source: La trecerea armatei ruse pe teritoriul principatului Moldova ofiţerii se foloseau de ajutorul populaţiei băştinaşe: ţărani, boieri, mazili, târgoveţi.
target: During the passage of the Russian army through the territory of the Principality of Moldova, the officers used the help of the local population: peasants, boyars, mazils, townspeople.
